page.title: 06SUPERSTORE AT WEST THURROCK
page.content: My mum works at Tesco in the Lakeside Development.Tesco is a superstore selling different things like toys, clothes,tools,bikes,wallpaper,computer s,records,books,wine and groceries. You will find my mum at the checkout desk.She looks at the prices on the goods,puts the prices into her till and the till adds them all up.Then she takes the customers' money and then gives them their change and their till receipt .My mum likes to work at Tesco because she meets lots of people .She has worked there since the store opened in 1984. She gets to work by car,sometimes her friend's car.My mum does not not do shift work, she only works in the evening.
